divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting in a chair watching planes going to baltimore Washington airport with a 10 by 50 binoculars I was facing east,I then notice a black object flying at the same speed of the plane near the front but high above the plane,it follow the plane for about 20 secondary the plane then made turn towards the west at the same time the object went straight up into the clouds I thought the object was a black dot on my glasses,but when I took my glasses off there was nothing on my glasses
Summary: a plane was going south towards.baltimore Washington airport,I notice there was a black object near the front end of the plane but above the. front end traveling at the same e speed when the plane started to turn west the object went straight up into the
